channel.title: Server Window Keeps Exiting?
channel.description:
Hello
I've recently set up a private server, and got everything up and running. I am able to log in an walk around but for only 30 seconds, after that the window that you play on closes, I have tried to fix this, but nothing has fixed the problem, does anyone know the issue that keep's occurring? :confused:

item.title: Server Window Keeps Exiting?
item.dc:creator: @The_Apocalypse1 The_Apocalypse
item.description:
@The_Apocalypse1 wrote:

So put pause on the very bottom, for example it would be this?

@echo off
@title Server
cd Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
Pause

Read full topic

item.title: Server Window Keeps Exiting?
item.dc:creator: @The_Apocalypse1 The_Apocalypse
item.description:
@The_Apocalypse1 wrote:

This is for the Client:
@echo off
@title Client
cd Client
java -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32

And this is for the server start:
@echo off
@title Server
cd Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Server Window Keeps Exiting?
item.dc:creator: @The_Apocalypse1 The_Apocalypse
item.description:
@The_Apocalypse1 wrote:

No, I am using Windows Vista 64 bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Window Keeps Exiting?

item.description:
@towriss wrote:

are you on windows 7? this happens to me alot on my other computer, which is win7

Read full topic
